CertificateEnrollment.description: This resource shall represent an automatic certificate enrollment for a Redfish implementation.
CertificateEnrollment.longDescription: The `CertificateEnrollment` schema describes an automatic certificate enrollment for a specific protocol such as ACME (Automatic Certificate Management Environment) or SCEP (Simple Certificate Enrollment Protocol).

enumLongDescriptions.ACME: This value shall indicate the enrollment uses the Automatic Certificate Management Environment (ACME) protocol as defined by RFC8555.
enumLongDescriptions.OEM: This value shall indicate the OEM enrollment protocol type.
enumLongDescriptions.SCEP: This value shall indicate the enrollment uses the Simple Certificate Enrollment Protocol (SCEP) protocol as defined by RFC8894.

title: #CertificateEnrollment.CertificateEnrollment
